sentences.en: Adopt advanced logical reasoning technology to improve logic simplification.
sentences.cn: 结合高级逻辑推导技术推进简化过程.

sentences.en: And, thought simplification, change one - sidedly , easy go to extremes.
sentences.cn: 而且, 思想简单化, 片面 化, 易走极端.

sentences.en: Calligraphy, the quintessential aesthetic form of Chinese writing, in fact favors simplification.
sentences.cn: 但是, 体现汉语文章形式美精髓的书法, 实际上却偏爱简化字.

sentences.en: Each answer had achieved mathematical simplification.
sentences.cn: 多个回答都作到数学上的简洁.

sentences.en: Horizons, as described above, are a simplification.
sentences.cn: 上述土层是一种简单划分.

sentences.en: It'sa gross over-simplification to fasten on to the red deer as a threat to the environment.
sentences.cn: 仅关注马鹿威胁环境的一面过于片面了。

sentences.en: Like any such diagram, it is a simplification.
sentences.cn: 像其他这种表格一样，这是简化了的。

sentences.en: Qualitative simplification has been suggested in the form of triboelectric series.
sentences.cn: 应用静电序列可以简化定性工作.

sentences.en: Subsurface water applications usually permit additional simplification.
sentences.cn: 应用于地下水时,一般还允许进一步的简化.

sentences.en: The drastic reduction in the geometric dimension leads to great simplification in mathematical analysis.
sentences.cn: 几何维数的急剧减少导致数字分析的极大简化.

sentences.en: This also increases reliability by simplification of the sealing arrangements.
sentences.cn: 这样,简化了密封结构,也就提高了可靠性.

sentences.en: This is one useful simplification for the English reader to bear in mind.
sentences.cn: 英语读者可以把这个简单有用的说法记在心里.

sentences.en: This simplification does not normally apply.
sentences.cn: 这一简化式不能正规使用.

sentences.en: What she said was a useful simplification of the theory.
sentences.cn: 她把这一理论讲得深入浅出.

sentences.en: Work simplification through improved product design has cut our quality problems.
sentences.cn: 通过改进产品设计以简化工序,解决了我们的产品质量问题.

words.tran_cn: 简单地；仅仅；简直；朴素地；坦白地

trans.tran_en: You can use simplification to refer to the thing that is produced when you make something simpler or when you reduce it to its basic elements
